Module.Name: Test systems
Module.Description: Test systems are biological or artificial systems used for assessing hazard in relation to chemical exposure from substances in varying doses. Test systems may refer to 1) in-vivo test systems (e.g. a rat 90-day study, a human biomonitoring study); 2) in-vitro test systems (e.g. HepaRG cells).
Module.DataDescription: Test systems are provided as data.
